Problem: Design and develop a scalable system to allow the deployment of Smart Traffic Lights across the country.
Method: Set up the database from ground up, and build pipelines for data-streaming.

Problem: Identify and categorise data on roads to allow smooth flow of traffic within cities.
Method: Set up a system that identifies objects (vehicles/pedestrains) from a live stream of videos, and categorise them.
Technical: Convolutional Neural Networks, Tensor Flow, OpenCV, Pandas, and Python

Method: Develop an algorithm which controls traffic lights based on available traffic data.
Technical: Neural Networks, Reinforcement Learning, Long-Short Term Memory, Genetic Algorithms, Mathematics (Matrixes and Vectors, Calculus), Pandas
